questionnaire.intro: To proceed to the next step, we'll need you to fill in this short questionnaire.

questionnaire.countryOperateQuestion: 2. Please select the country/countries in which your clients will be located.

questionnaire.howAttractClientsQuestion: 5. How do you attract the clients you refer? (tick all that apply)
questionnaire.regulatedQuestion: 6. Are you regulated by any Financial services Authority?

virtualTour.title: Start your virtual tour
virtualTour.subTitle: A step-by-step guide on how to use your account

steps.dashboard: Check what's new, create new deals and partner links from your personal dashboard.
steps.wallet: Get a full spectrum view of your transaction history and cash in your earnings with zero fees.
steps.marketing: Get free access to our rich marketing and advertising resources. Need something we don't have? Send us a request and we will sort it out for  you.
steps.tradingTools: Both beginners and advanced traders can get more from their online trading with our powerful trading tools and advanced analytics.
steps.education: Your clients can kickstart their  trading journey with tailored courses, video tutorials and online quizzes!
steps.analytics: Monitor performance and identify areas of improvement to meet your short and long-term goals.
steps.products: Axiance clients have access to the highest quality products and service available.
steps.promos: Discover the bonus schemes, promotions and clubs your clients' have access to.
steps.createDeal: Create a new deal and maximise your profits in just a few minutes.
steps.balance: Review the balance of your paid or unpaid commissions and your clients' deposits and withdrawals.
steps.partnerLinks: Generate your unique partner links and track where conversions come from.
steps.language: Use the language bar to switch between languages.
steps.settings: Manage your account information, communication preferences and personal information in one place.

metaTrader4.title: METATRADER 4
bullets: A range of technical analysis tools
paragraphs: MetaTrader4 is a complete and customizable working environment developed by MetaQuotes company. From a technical point of view traders can download and integrate even more technical indicators to the charts allowing to extract market information or trading signals. From an aesthetic point of view, the trader can customize colors and choose between Japanese candlesticks, bar or line charts to read markets.

But MT4 is above all preferred for its programming language MQL4. It is quite close to C++ and many traders with programming skills exchange the trading tools they created, thus helping MT4’s success. The growing number of integrations available provides plenty of choices for traders to generate strategies and automate Expert Advisors in seconds.

MetaTrader4 also enjoys global recognition for the security it provides. It encrypts personal data and transactions with a 129-bit key and hides trader IP. This platform is ideal for advanced traders who focus on forex and leveraged CFD trading, as it provides enhanced technical analysis tools and leaves a lot of room integration.

metaTrader5.title: METATRADER 5
paragraphs: MT5 is preferred by institutional traders as it gives them access to a greater number of markets, including stocks, commodities, stock indices and crypto. It also offers new decision support and technical analysis tools, more technical indicators, fundamental analysis tools and more types of market orders than its predecessor MT4. It also the possibility to view more chart periods as well as the economic calendar.

It features the built-in MetaTrader Market where traders can purchase or rent a trading robot or a technical indicator. The MQL5 language it uses opens more possibilities in terms of programming for those who seek complex and faster algorithmic trading. MT5 will also work like charm for manual traders and is particularly intuitive and friendly to newcomers.

copyTrade.title: Copy Trade
copyTrade.subtitle: search, follow, and copy
copyTrade.description1: Axiance copy trading brings you thousands of people, their choices, their trades, and their strategies in a transparent platform. Your clients can
copyTrade.description2: the trading movements of successful and more experienced traders. All they must do is pick a strategy provider from the social feed and copy it. Simple, transparent, and social!

vipClub.title: VIP
vipClub.subtitle: Min. Total Deposits
bullets: Development of an individual business plan

clubMemberSectionOne.clubSubtitle: New and existing clients can earn up to 10% interest on their investment regardless of their trading outcome. Here’s how it works:
bullets: Clients can credit their trading account within the promotional period and receive an accrual on the deposited funds.
The interest is accrued based on Clients’ deposited amount or equity.
The interest rate promo is eligible for deposits up to USD 30,000 or equivalent in other currencies.

clubMemberSectionTwo.clubSubtitle: Clients who credit their Axiance Account are qualified for a 100% Rebate on their investment. Here’s how it works:
bullets: Clients can fund their trading account within the promotional period and collect their bonus.
The rebate bonus is eligible for deposits from USD 30,000 or equivalent in other currencies.
The offer is only available for CFDs on Forex.
